Title: A Worthy Challenge: Wing Leader Ner'onok
Description:
$n, I need you to assemble an eagle-eyed group and lead them into the Siege of Niuzao Temple. Activate the Challenger's Orb and ground Wing Leader Ner'onok.

Return to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Siege of Niuzao Temple Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Text: Complete the Siege of Niuzao Temple Challenge Mode
